item.title: Build your own Game Controller
item.description: Course Examples Simple Button Button Keyboard Button Mouse Simple Analog Joystick Mouse Full Controller Arduino Micro Pinout Summary Course Notes Students in this course will build the own game controller from scratch capable of providing input to a variety of PC games. The course includes instruction on resistors, switches and using Arduino to behave as a USB keyboard and mouse. This is based on labs 1 and 2 from E190U offered in Spring 2015 at Harvey Mudd College.
